mapper.select: select count(*) as countall, count(case when app_sts='001' then 1 end) as applying, count(case when app_sts='002' then 1 end) as passdoc, count(case when app_sts='003' then 1 end) as failed, count(case when app_sts='004' then 1 end) as pass from apply where user_id = #{mbid}

select sub.app_regdate, sub.com_app_sts, re.res_title, com.com_name, co.comm_ctx from (select co2.comm_ctx as com_app_sts, ap2.* from apply ap2 inner join comm co2 on ap2.app_sts=co2.sub_cat where ap2.user_id='dmdtla054' and co2.main_cat='065') sub inner join resume re on sub.user_id=re.user_id and sub.res_code=re.res_code inner join announce an on sub.anno_code=an.anno_code inner join company com on an.com_id=com.com_id inner join comm co on an.job_tag=co.sub_cat where sub.user_id=#{mbid} and co.main_cat='001'
